question: oldest confirmed upper paleolithic cave paintings radiocarbon date years ago chauvet france
ground_truth_answer: Based on radiocarbon dating of black from drawings, torch marks and floors, the oldest confirmed paintings in the Chauvet cave in France have been dated to 32,900±490 years ago.
